message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $120.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it offers.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  $60 is quite low,  How about we meet in the middle somewhere around $95?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $72.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference and settle at $86?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'd be willing to go up to $82.
